title: Trisotech Inks Partnership With Wendan Consulting
text: Trisotech Inks Partnership With Wendan Consulting Trisotech forms a training/consulting partnership with Wendan Consulting. MONTREAL, QC, September 05,   Trisotech (http://www.trisotech.com) announced today that they have formed a training/consulting partnership with Wendan Inc. dba Wendan Consulting, a management consulting firm focused on business transformation with headquarters in Downers Grove, Illinois. Daniel Morris, Founder and Managing Partner at Wendan, is a noted speaker, author and executive consultant who is both a Certified Business Architect (CBA) and a Certified Business Process Professional (CBPP) says, "We, at Wendan Consulting, are proud to partner with Trisotech. Their Digital Enterprise Suite is one of the most advanced business analysis and design tools available. We look forward to working with them to deliver unparalleled business transformation capabilities to our customers." "Trisotech is very pleased to partner with Wendan Consulting. Dan and his team are experts in business operations transformation and improvement and they have worked on both the business and IT sides of organizational change. Wendan understands how to implement business strategy and how to align work with that strategy." says Trisotech CSO, George Barlow. "They plan to use the Digital Enterprise Suite to analyze and find new insights into their clients' business processes, to help clients discover and model their processes and rules, and to provide BPMN training." About Wendan Consulting Wendan is a management consulting firm focused on business transformation. We work collaboratively with business and IT professionals to solve complex operation improvement challenges facing their company today. As recognized thought leaders in the transformation industry, our consultants have helped clients achieve transformation and improvement success leveraging practices and methods that we have pioneered and written about in books, PEX columns, and papers. Wendan Consulting's senior consultants have each earned a reputation for excellence in business operation optimization. We offer advice and support following both iBPM and orchestration based approaches that align business and IT to deliver integrated solutions. Our work is based on an advanced methodology that combines the best parts of Agile and Waterfall approaches and leverages iBPM, orchestration and advanced analytics to deliver solutions that fit the business operation and are accepted by the target users and customers. We firmly believe that we not only must deliver target outcomes, but we must also leave your staff with greater BPMS/BPM understanding than they had before we arrived. Website: http://www.wendan-consulting.comAbout Trisotech Trisotech is a global leader in digital enterprise transformation solutions, offering innovative and easy-to-use software tools that allow customers to discover, model, analyze, transform and find insights into their digital enterprise. Trisotech customers use The Digital Enterprise Suite to provide new and revolutionary ways for their knowledge workers to collaborate and succeed in an increasingly global, connected and competitive world. Trisotech products are providing digital transformation help to manufacturing, financial, healthcare, insurance, energy, distribution, government, and many other types of organizations. Trisotech is a privately held company. Website: http://www.trisotech.com
